Comment.val: /* Create or refresh the Address Book data set */
/* If TRUE, then the task will run in the background. Otherwise, it can be run manually by the user, from a menu or push button. */

STP.TXT: Are you sure you want to delete everything?

Text.val: If Autorun is TRUE, then just create the data and exit.
